achievements: Known for her role as Penelope Alvarez in the Netflix sitcom 'One Day at a Time'
Won an Imagen Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role for her performance in 'Six Feet Under'
Known for her vibrant and eclectic style, blending bohemian and mid-century modern aesthetics
Founded the blog and design company 'The Jungalow'
Authored several books on interior design and plant styling
